title: Relaxed Neo Classical - 25 Min Modern Classical Focus Music | Pravos Sessions
description:
Experience Relaxed Neo Classical - a 25-minute modern classical journey designed for calm, focused work.

Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) is the focus workspace I couldn't find, so I built it. Simple interface. Beautiful music. Timer and tasks in one place. No friction between you and your work.

This album brings modern classical elegance to your focus session. Strings, piano, space to breathe. The familiar 25-minute arc that carries you from start to finish without distraction.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz

ABOUT THE MUSIC
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Modern classical compositions for calm concentration
Perfect for writing, studying, and creative work
